alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 7:05PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN NATRONA COUNTY THROUGH 745 PM MDT... At 705 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alcova, which is also 31 miles southwest of Casper, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Alcova around 710 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include southwestern Casper, Red Butte and Paradise Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
